Module pipeline
Package tcpassos.pipeline

Interface UnaryPipeline.Builder<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Input and output element type of the pipeline
Enclosing interface:
UnaryPipeline<T>
public static interface UnaryPipeline.Builder<T>
Builder with methods to add stages to the pipeline

      Adds a stage to filter the output element of the pipeline
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Builder<T>

    • filterMap

      UnaryPipeline.Builder<T> filterMap(Predicate<T> filter, Function<T,T> ifTrue)
      Filters and maps the elements of the pipeline.
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used to filter the elements
      ifTrue - the function used to map the elements if the predicate is true
      Returns:
      a new pipeline with the filtered and mapped elements

    • filterMap

      UnaryPipeline.Builder<T> filterMap(Predicate<T> filter, Function<T,T> ifTrue, Function<T,T> ifFalse)
      Filters the elements of the pipeline based on the given predicate and applies the corresponding mapping functions.
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used to filter the elements
      ifTrue - the mapping function to be applied to elements that satisfy the predicate
      ifFalse - the mapping function to be applied to elements that do not satisfy the predicate
      Returns:
      a new pipeline with the filtered and mapped elements

    • filterProcess

      UnaryPipeline.Builder<T> filterProcess(Predicate<T> filter, Consumer<T> ifTrue)
      Filters the pipeline process based on the given filter predicate. If the filter predicate evaluates to true, the provided consumer is executed.
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used to filter the pipeline process
      ifTrue - the consumer to be executed if the filter predicate evaluates to true
      Returns:
      the updated pipeline builder

    • filterProcess

      UnaryPipeline.Builder<T> filterProcess(Predicate<T> filter, Consumer<T> ifTrue, Consumer<T> ifFalse)
      Filters the elements in the pipeline based on the given predicate and performs different actions depending on whether the predicate is true or false.
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used to filter the elements
      ifTrue - the consumer to be executed for elements that pass the filter
      ifFalse - the consumer to be executed for elements that do not pass the filter
      Returns:
      the builder instance with the filter process added

    • fork

      BranchedPipeline.Builder<T,T> fork(Function<UnaryPipeline.Builder<T>,UnaryPipeline.Builder<T>>... branches)
      Forks the pipeline into multiple branches.
      Parameters:
      branches - the functions that define the branches of the pipeline
      Returns:
      a builder for the branched pipeline

    • fork

      <NEW_END> BranchedPipeline.Builder<T,NEW_END> fork(Collection<OptionalPipeline<T,NEW_END>> pipelines)
      Forks the pipeline into multiple branches.
      Type Parameters:
      NEW_END - the type of the new end result of the branches
      Parameters:
      pipelines - the pipelines to connect to
      Returns:
      a builder for the branched pipeline

    • map

      Parameters:
      mapper - Function to transform the output element
      Returns:

    • pipe

      UnaryPipeline.Builder<T> pipe(OptionalPipeline<? super T,T> nextPipe)
      Adds a stage to pipe the output element of the pipeline to another pipeline
      Parameters:
      nextPipe - Pipeline to be connected at the end of this pipeline
      Returns:
      Builder<T>

    • pipe

      Connects the current pipeline to the specified branched pipeline.
      Type Parameters:
      NEW_END - the type of the end result of the branched pipeline
      Parameters:
      nextPipe - the branched pipeline to connect to
      Returns:
      the builder for the branched pipeline
